computer science- 1/10

library-1/10                  You would have to pay a lot of attention in some of the subjects (latin) and in another, the teacher showed favoritism and was unfair. :( in math last year i got an A+ easily but this year honors started and we started a 9th grade algebra course in 7th grade. Next year im hoping to do better. :D
